channel.title: Server Request
channel.description:
Hey guys
Can someone PLEASE make me a server? They will have free adminship, spawn ability, and membership. (If you can set that all up. ;)
You can be co-owner. But there's one exception. I'd have the ROOT account, you can have the co-owner account. I can give details of how I'd want the server made out. Here they are
Things to start with on default account: - Robin Hood Hat - Mystic robe top and bottom - Abby Whip - Prayer book - and if you can make them have 1m when they start, that'd be good.
Different things: - Admins and Members can spawn items, no one else. - I'd like the map just like the one in Project Czar, the one that starts you near the gaming place. - I would like it if there were teleports to the KQ, Dagganoth, Rock Crabs, and maybe a few more places. - It'd be pretty cool if we had an Edgeville wildy teleport. - Having an altar that converts you to ancients (not in the middle of the desert) would be good, instead of a side-tab. - If you could put it on a Silab Client, that would be good.
Please, everyone, if you could make the server, I would help all I could at running it. My computer is low memory so I can't make a server very well. Thanks!
-Z0xo

item.title: Server Request
item.dc:creator: @Z0xo Z0xo
item.description:
@Z0xo wrote:

Oh! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2007, 08:34:20 PM[/size][hr]Alright guys. I’m so confused that I can’t start over. If someone would donate a server that they don’t want anymore, it’d be highly appreciated. (I wouldn’t steal it or anything, or change the password, but it’d be cool to spawn items when no one else can. xD)

Read full topic

item.description:
@Z0xo wrote:

It doesnt tell me what programs to have or anything. I opened the PimpScape thing and it doesn’t say which program. I figured out it was java, but then I got stuck there.

item.title: Server Request
item.dc:creator: @Z0xo Z0xo
item.description:
@Z0xo wrote:

Well the thing is,

  1. I don’t have windows XP. I have Vista.
  2. Slow computer.
  3. The directions arent very clear.
  4. You can get all of the credit if you DO make the server, I’m not a poser.

-Z0xo

Read full topic

item.title: Server Request
item.dc:creator: @Z0xo Z0xo
item.description:
@Z0xo wrote:

Hey guys

Can someone PLEASE make me a server? They will have free adminship, spawn ability, and membership. (If you can set that all up.

You can be co-owner. But there’s one exception. I’d have the ROOT account, you can have the co-owner account. I can give details of how I’d want the server made out. Here they are

Things to start with on default account:

  • Robin Hood Hat
  • Mystic robe top and bottom
  • Abby Whip
  • Prayer book
  • and if you can make them have 1m when they start, that’d be good.

Different things:

  • Admins and Members can spawn items, no one else.
  • I’d like the map just like the one in Project Czar, the one that starts you near the gaming place.
  • I would like it if there were teleports to the KQ, Dagganoth, Rock Crabs, and maybe a few more places.
  • It’d be pretty cool if we had an Edgeville wildy teleport.
  • Having an altar that converts you to ancients (not in the middle of the desert) would be good, instead of a side-tab.
  • If you could put it on a Silab Client, that would be good.

Please, everyone, if you could make the server, I would help all I could at running it. My computer is low memory so I can’t make a server very well. Thanks!

-Z0xo
